708029f-a.title: Manhattan: 3rd Avenue - 27th Street (East)
708029f-a.text:
Third Ave., east side, north from East 27th Street, showing the 28th
Street station of the Third Ave. Elevated Line, and the tower of the Chrysler
Building.
December 23, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

711853f-a.title: Manhattan: 27th Street - 3rd Avenue
711853f-a.text:
27th Street, west from but not including Third Ave.
Pebruary 23, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

711854f-a.title: Manhattan: 27th Street - 3rd Avenue
711854f-a.text:
27th Street, north side, west from 157 East 27th Street, north side,
west of Third Avenue, to the N. E. corner of Lexington Avenue.
February 23, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
